This is the Specs for the admin home page cell width sizes using blueprint.css

Image on Top
Column Size Width Size
1 Span 18
2 Span 9
3 Span 6
4 Remove
5 Remove
Image on Side
Column Size Left Side Right Side
1 Span 6 Span 12
2 Span 4 Span 5
3 Go to image on top
4 Remove
5 Remove

<< You can use this pseudocode for the Cell template >>
 PARAMETER left_span        <!-- Ether ‘span-6’ or ‘span-4’ determined by column_size -->
PARAMETER right_span        <!-- Ether ‘span-12 last’ or ‘span-5 last’ determined by column_size -->

when (image given)

    if (URL given)
        if (float_image not = ‘right’ OR column_size = 3)
            Open <a> tag        <!-- See comments in this web page's code -->

    when (float_image = ‘top’ OR column_size = 3)
        Display image
        if (URL given)
            Close </a> tag        <!-- See comments in this web page's code -->
        Display body copy
    otherwise
        when (float_image = ‘left’)
            Display image with class left_span
            if (URL given)
                Close </a> tag        <!-- See comments in this web page's code -->
            Display body copy with class right_span
        otherwise
            Display body copy with class left_span
            when (URL given)
               Wrap <a></a> tag around and Display image with class right_span
            otherwise
               Display image with class right_span
        .
    .
otherwise
    Display body copy

if (URL given AND display_footer = TRUE)
    Wrap <a></a> tag around and display footer link
